// Pivot 0, 0
int background_with_flippers[28] = {
	110, 680,
	120, 682,
	125, 694,
	124, 701,
	110, 697,
	84, 682,
	79, 679,
	76, 671,
	75, 627,
	79, 621,
	86, 618,
	92, 622,
	98, 632,
	93, 638
}; second and one before last

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
